The money that it would save to help bring the national debt down . They could put it to good use on the ones who pay their wage .
attributes.background:
Take all the MP's expenses away . 
Food , drink Christmas party's decorations, travel, accommodation.
If you or I wanted a job say 100 miles away from home , we would have to pay our own way including lunch accommodation insurance etc .

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
